22.post_text: The #Ferrari70 celebrations come to an end today. Let’s take a look back at some of the most exciting moments. #Ferrari

comments.message:
70 years a visionary used his on behalf to create automobiles. From breeding horses to automobile sports. From an unknown brand not a big deal, to one of the best and fastest in the world. Today the mark of the horse is synonymous with excitement, speed, technology, design and quality.
Enzo Ferrari is such a visionary.
Ferrari. The best of the world.

Ein Ferrari ist,war und bleibt ein Ferrari der Rest ist kopie,werbung oder nur ein Auto.
